ArmyFactory
Class HighTechArmy

java.lang.Object
  ArmyFactory.Army
      ArmyFactory.HighTechArmy

public class HighTechArmy
extends Army

This class extends the Army class. An instance of this class gives the values to add to a state's population, soldiers, and tanks values during the production stage.

Field Summary
 
Fields inherited from class ArmyFactory.Army
addedPopulation, addedSoldiers, addedTanks, POPULATIONINCREASEFACTOR, SOLDIERINCREASEFACTOR, TANKINCREASEFACTOR
 
Constructor Summary
HighTechArmy(State s)
          Users should use the ArmyFactory's static method to get an army.

Methods inherited from class ArmyFactory.Army

Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

Constructor Detail

HighTechArmy

public HighTechArmy(State s)

Users should use the ArmyFactory's static method to get an army.

The constructor takes the state s, and initializes the values for addedPopulation, addedSoldiers, and addedTanks, which can be added to the population, soldiers, and tanks values respectively for state s during the production stage.

This class is for high tech armies only.

Parameters:
s - The state for which the added values should be calculated for.
